column1: Almost new corner condo! Large open kitchen w/island that has room for chairs. Granite counters ~ gas range ~ microwave & dishwasher. Lots of kitchen storage & prep areas. Gas fireplace in living/dining room. Balcony with great view. Large Master bedroom with walk-in closet & master bath. Private garage w/remote control then take the elevator up to your home! Bright and spacious  level Condo in Stone Ridge. Open Living Room w/Gas Fireplace ~ lots of natural light and Wood Flooring Kitchen w/Breakfast Bar ~ Master Bedroom and attached bath with Soaking Tub and Sep Shower. Enjoy the terrace off Master Bedroom. One Car Attached Garage with Driveway. Enjoy the many amenities of Stone Ridge Community. Walk to Shops and Dining.
